turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need help finding a hotel for a trip next month.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help with that. To start, please tell me the destination city, your desired check-in and check-out dates, and how many adults and children will be staying.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's for London. Check-in on July 15th, check-out on July 20th. Just two adults. And it's really important that the hotel has free breakfast, please. We had such a terrible time last trip without it.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for the details. I'm searching for hotels in London for two adults from July 15th to July 20th. I've prioritized results that mention breakfast options. Here are a few initial suggestions based on availability: 1. The Grand Plaza Hotel (4 stars) - mentions a restaurant on site. 2. City View Inn (3 stars) - includes continental breakfast. 3. Central Suites London (4 stars) - breakfast available (additional charge may apply).

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, okay. Two of those say 'mentions a restaurant' or 'breakfast available (additional charge)'. I specifically asked for *free* breakfast. The City View Inn sounds promising with 'includes continental breakfast', but I'm worried about its location. Are any of these hotels actually in the Covent Garden or West End area, and do they *definitely* offer free breakfast, not just paid options?
